title: failed to launch rads system rads_user_kernel.exe. THIS WILL HELP YOU

embed.description: http://www.mediafire.com/?88dsviq6z29v12l THIS IS DOWNLOAD LINK !! PS:If this dont work try to run in as administator or reinstall the game^^ ENJOY PLEASE LIKE SUB AND SHARE !!

body:
Hey guys! I just wanna say to anyone that has problems with: "Failed to launch RADS/system/rads_user_kernel.exe" here is MY solution. 

So listen, today i wanted to play some LoL but the error showed up.. i was searching trough the forums and i saw 1 video that said to install kernel.exe.
When downloaded man on the video said that we need to copy that in Riot Games folder. But i did NOT have any of files he had.. so i scrolled trough the comments and see one man asking what to do bout that, and the man responded with: "Reinstall the game.". I reinstalled it and it works :). So you try to reinstall the game and see, to ME it worked :)  P.S i have windows 7 ;)  (sorry for bad english)

replies.body:
That is a really old video and has suggestions I would not recommend.  Downloading something like that from an unofficial source is a really bad idea, as you can never be sure what it may actually contain.  I recommend running a virus scan just to be sure.

The error you're receiving is usually just a security setting with your PC that's blocking the patcher from loading or reading your game files.  You should go over the steps found in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help.  Let me know if you have any questions!
